game.name: Hack And Climb
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 던지고, 찍고, 올라라. 고난도 물리 기반 플랫폼 액션. 무기를 해금하고 정상을 정복하라. 준비됐나?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Be the weapon! Swing like an axe, thrust like a spear, and soar like an arrow in this physics-based platformer. Flip, throw, and carve your path to the peak! Rage burns, revenge awaits... Are you up to the challenge?
